featuredProjects.title: E-Commerce Platform
featuredProjects.description: A comprehensive e-commerce solution with secure payment processing, user authentication, and responsive design. Features include product catalog, shopping cart, and order management.

featuredProjects.title: Task Management System
featuredProjects.description: Collaborative project management tool with real-time updates and team collaboration features. Includes task assignment, progress tracking, and deadline notifications.

featuredProjects.title: Analytics Dashboard
featuredProjects.description: Data visualization platform with interactive charts and customizable reporting features. Provides insights through real-time data analysis and exportable reports.

otherProjects.title: Weather Application
otherProjects.description: Real-time weather forecasting app with location detection and interactive maps. Provides hourly and weekly forecasts with visual representations.

otherProjects.title: Portfolio Website
otherProjects.description: Personal portfolio website showcasing projects and skills. Features responsive design, animations, and contact form integration.

otherProjects.title: Recipe Finder
otherProjects.description: Recipe search application with filtering options and user favorites. Includes ingredient-based search and nutritional information.

otherProjects.title: Fitness Tracker
otherProjects.description: Workout tracking application with progress visualization and goal setting. Includes exercise library and personalized workout plans.

otherProjects.title: Chat Application
otherProjects.description: Real-time messaging platform with private and group chat functionality. Features include message encryption, file sharing, and user presence indicators.
